summary: Successfully tested Ecommify's CS:GO ranking system and WSZYSTKIE tab functionality. Backend APIs: 100% pass rate (19/19 including new combined stats). Frontend: 98% success rate with all major features working including PIN login, CS:GO rank display, WSZYSTKIE tab, per-shop breakdown, income addition, and navigation.

passed_tests: PIN login (2409) works perfectly → loads game menu with CS:GO rank
CS:GO rank system displays correctly (Silver I rank card)
250k target progress bar shows 0.1% with forecast (984 zl)
Game menu shows today's combined stats from all shops
WYNIKI tile navigation works → loads results page
WSZYSTKIE tab is active by default as required
WSZYSTKIE tab shows combined KPIs including 'Na leb' (profit÷2)
Sparkline chart renders successfully on Wyniki page
Day expansion works → shows per-shop breakdown with +P/+A buttons
Add income functionality works via +P button → 150.00 PLN added successfully
Data saves and KPIs update correctly after income addition
Tab switching from WSZYSTKIE to ecom1 works perfectly
Individual shop tabs show direct +P/+A buttons
Bottom navigation 'Menu' returns to game hub
ZADANIA tile loads Kanban interface (3 columns: Do zrobienia, W trakcie, Gotowe)
All backend APIs working: Auth, Monthly Stats, Combined Stats, Tasks, Financial (19/19)
Logout functionality works → returns to PIN login screen

success_percentage.backend: 100% (19/19 tests passed including new combined-monthly-stats endpoint)
